description:
An adventure game with a twist. Death’s deal means Sam must 
survive a day controlling his entire body manually. Breathing, 
blinking & driving, all these tasks fall to you. Updated to take 
advantage of the Nintendo Switch™ Joy-Con™ features such as 
motion sensors & split Joy-Con support for 2 player co-op.
name: Manual Samuel
intro:
Meet Samuel, he’s handsome, wealthy and most importantly – 
dead. A deal with Death gives Samuel one last chance to live!
